Text: Simon Thompson  Simon Thompson  Alpha Real Trust (ARTL:175p), an investor in high-yielding property and asset-backed debt and equity investments, has increased its pro-forma net asset value (NAV) by 4 per cent to a record high of £115.2m (212.5p a share) in the three months to 30 June 2019 after adjusting for the post-period cash return of £22.9m to shareholders.
Cause: adjusting for the post-period cash return of £22.9m to shareholders.

Sentence: <e2>Simon Thompson  Simon Thompson  Alpha Real Trust (ARTL:175p), an investor in high-yielding property and asset-backed debt and equity investments, has increased its pro-forma net asset value (NAV) by 4 per cent to a record high of £115.2m (212.5p a share) in the three months to 30 June 2019</e2> after <e1>adjusting for the post-period cash return of £22.9m to shareholders.</e1>
